speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: SCENE XI. Another part of the same.

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Enter OCTAVIUS CAESAR, and his Army

speaker: OCTAVIUS CAESAR
text_entry: But being charged, we will be still by land,

speaker: OCTAVIUS CAESAR
text_entry: Which, as I take't, we shall; for his best force

speaker: OCTAVIUS CAESAR
text_entry: Is forth to man his galleys. To the vales,
